const EMAIL_PATTERN = "[a-zA-Z0-9_.]+@[a-zA-Z0-9_]+\\.[a-z]{2,}"
const NAME_PATTERN = "^[а-яА-ЯёЁa-zA-Z]+$"

const DESKTOP_COUNTER_MOVIES = 3
const TABLET_COUNTER_MOVIES = 2
const MOBILE_COUNTER_MOVIES = 2

/** регулярное выражение */
const EMAIL_REGEX = "[a-zA-Z0-9_.]+@[a-zA-Z0-9_]+\\.[a-z]{2,}"

/** для фильтра длительности фильмов по времени */
const MAX_DURATION_MOVIE = 40

const MaxScreen = 1280
const MediumScreen = 1024
const SmallScreen = 650
const InitMoreMaxScreen = 16
const InitLessMaxScreen = 12
const InitMediumScreen = 8
const InitSmallScreen = 5
const StepMaxScreen = 4
const StepMediumScreen = 3
const StepSmallScreen = 2

export {
  EMAIL_PATTERN,
  NAME_PATTERN,
  MaxScreen,
  MediumScreen,
  SmallScreen,
  InitMoreMaxScreen,
  InitLessMaxScreen,
  InitMediumScreen,
  InitSmallScreen,
  StepMaxScreen,
  StepMediumScreen,
  StepSmallScreen
}
